author: wn.com
title: UN chooses eight communities as Champions of Disaster Risk Reduction (UNISDR - United Nations Office ...
text: ( Source : UNISDR - United Nations Office for Disaster Reduction ) 13 October 2015 , GENEVA - Eight communities living with the threat of floods, storms, earthquakes and volcanic eruptions were today recognised as Champions of Disaster Risk
